title: Privacy Policy for GOLD DZ App
introduction: Welcome to the GOLD DZ app. We take your privacy seriously. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and with whom we share it. By using the app, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

content.text: To provide the best possible service, we handle different types of data, and we believe in full transparency about them:
a) Data We Absolutely Do Not Collect:
We do not collect, request, or store any Personally Identifiable Information (PII). This includes:

items: Contacts, photos, or any personal files from your device.

content.text: To ensure the app's core functions work and to improve them, we collect limited, non-personal data:

items: Notification Identifier (Firebase Cloud Messaging Token): This is a unique, anonymous token that your device assigns to the app. We use it solely to send you instant notifications when gold prices change. This identifier does not reveal your personal identity.

App Usage Data (Firebase Analytics): We collect anonymous statistical data about how you interact with the app, such as the screens you visit, the buttons you press, and the most used features. We use this data to understand user behavior, fix bugs, and improve the overall app experience.

content.text: c) Data Saved Only on Your Device (Local Data):

Some of your preferences are saved locally on your device using LocalStorage technology to provide a personalized experience. This data never reaches our servers and remains under your complete control:

items: Preferred Language: To save the language you have chosen (Arabic, French, English).
Preferred Theme: To save your choice between light and dark mode.
Notification Status: To remember whether you have enabled notifications or not.
To provide our services: We use the notification identifier to send the alerts you request.
To improve the app: We use anonymous Analytics data to analyze performance and identify features that need improvement.
To personalize your experience: We use locally saved data to display the app with your preferred settings on each use.

content.text: We do not sell or rent your data to any third party. However, we rely on trusted third-party services to operate the app, which may collect data according to their own privacy policies:

items: Google Firebase (Analytics & Messaging): A service from Google we use to send notifications and collect anonymous usage statistics.

Google AdMob: We use this service to display ads within the app, which is one way we support keeping the app free. AdMob may use device identifiers to collect data to show you personalized ads. You can view Google's privacy policy to learn more: policies.google.com/privacy
GitHub & Google Apps Script: We use these services to fetch gold price data and articles securely and anonymously.

content.text: We are committed to protecting your data. Since we do not store any personal information on our servers, the risk is limited. The anonymous data we collect is processed and stored securely through Google services, which apply global security standards.
The app contains ads provided by a third party (Google AdMob). These ads help keep the app free. Ad providers may use cookies and similar technologies to display ads that are relevant to you.

The app may contain links to our pages on social media platforms (like Facebook and TikTok) or email. When you click on these links, you are redirected to an external service subject to its own privacy policy. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites.

Our app is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children. If we discover that we have collected data from a child without parental consent, we will delete it immediately.
We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will post any changes on this page. We recommend reviewing this policy periodically to stay informed of any updates.
If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact us via email: golddzapp@gmail.com
